## <!-- Based on: https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot/blob/main/instructions/documentation.instructions.md -->

## description: "Documentation standards for Jekyll static sites."

# Documentation Guidelines

- Keep `README.md` up to date with setup, build, and deployment instructions.
- Document any new includes, layouts, or custom scripts.
- Use comments in HTML, CSS, and JS for clarity where needed.
- Provide clear commit messages describing changes.
